fun.connor.lighter.undertow

Class UndertowHttpHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.undertow.UndertowHttpHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.undertow.server.HttpHandler

    public class UndertowHttpHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.undertow.server.HttpHandler
    Implementation of HttpHandler that delegates responsibility to a LighterRequestResolver. This handler assumes that it is already placed on a worker thread and will usually attempt to perform blocking IO.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UndertowHttpHandler(LighterRequestResolver resolver, TypeAdapterFactory typeAdapterFactory, java.util.List<GlobalRequestTransformer> requestTransformers)
      Construct an HTTP handler that delgeates to the provider LighterRequestResolver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void handleRequest(io.undertow.server.HttpServerExchange exchange)

    • Constructor Detail

      • UndertowHttpHandler

        UndertowHttpHandler(LighterRequestResolver resolver,
                    TypeAdapterFactory typeAdapterFactory,
                    java.util.List<GlobalRequestTransformer> requestTransformers)
        Construct an HTTP handler that delgeates to the provider LighterRequestResolver.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to delegate to
        typeAdapterFactory - the application top level TypeAdapterFactory.
        requestTransformers - the chain of GlobalRequestTransformer to apply to every response.

    • Method Detail

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(io.undertow.server.HttpServerExchange exchange)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses the path and query parameters and generates a Response from the LighterRequestResolver. Then all GlobalRequestTransformers are applied to the response and the response is written back to the exchange.
        Specified by:
        handleRequest in interface io.undertow.server.HttpHandler
        Parameters:
        exchange - The exchange to resolve.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the case of an unrecoverable error. This checked exception ensures that no handling error will crash the server.
